website_summaries.verdict: This is the bag for the intermediate boxer who wants to take things to the next level.
pros: All-leather welted seams are triple stitched and precision balanced

customer_reviews.title: If you're good at a speed bag and I mean good this isn't the one
customer_reviews.text: I like that it says ( title classic) on it. But just like Nike's your paying for a brand name. In my opinion an this is not my first nor my fifth speedboat that I have gotten, an all on a very good speed bag platform with zero vibration to interrupt my rythm or speed or rebound. For the durability part I put three stars. Cuz I have just gotten it. due to the fact that I constantly brake them I have a good feeling that this one won't last more than a week. In my opinion (the Pro impact small speed bag). is the best bang for your buck considering these 2 are the same price.
customer_reviews.author: Wyatt pride

customer_reviews.title: Speed bag standard
customer_reviews.text: This is probably one of title's better bags. This and the black patent leather bag are very nice bags. This comes in 5x8 and 6x9 so there should be one for any mid or advanced bagger. It's shape makes it forgiving to hit as it has a large sweet spot. The colored title bags are also good bags if you change out the butyl bladders for latex ones. This bag has a butyl bladder but it doesn't have the dead feeling that the colored title bags have. I would say that this is a bag you can learn on and grow your skills with.
customer_reviews.author: BaggericTop Contributor: Boxing

customer_reviews.title: Title bags
customer_reviews.text: Can't complain about the price vs quality. It is a decent bag & it appears to hold air well. This is not a beginner bag; it is actually smaller than the size would suggest. That said, I made the move on the extra large size --same brand,decent quality. This is where I need to start.
customer_reviews.author: danf415

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Initially I was skeptical of this bag when I first received my package. I have always used a much larger bag and this was very difficult to get used to. The bag itself needed a week or so before it felt broken in and the stitching was a little rough so I recommend using gloves with this product. Pros: -Holds air efficiently and doesn't leak after extended periods of use -Helps develop quick hands -Good price for quality -Top loop does not twist easily, bag stays straight during use Cons: - Learning curve for normal speed use
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: speed bag
customer_reviews.text: pretty good bag. seems like it can take a pretty good amount of abuse and come back for more. It's a little smaller than what I thought it would be. going by the dimensions doesn't do it justice until you see the actual product inflated. overall, it's a nice bag for the set up conditions I needed it for. I have it hanging from a swivel hook that I attached to a wooden board that I have attached to a chinning bar in a doorway.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce W. M.

customer_reviews.title: Good bag, but sewn on label is a pain.
customer_reviews.text: This bag is great! Has a lot of life to it. I’ve been working out on it regularly for several months with no sign of significant wear. The only downside is that the label is sewn on and chafes your knuckles if you hit it without gloves on. I would have preferred no label or a printed on logo so I could more comfortably hit it bear fisted.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B

customer_reviews.title: This bag is more for an advanced speed bag workout!
customer_reviews.text: I transitioned from a medium bag; smaller bag works more upper back and shoulder more deeply! I don’t think this would be a good bag for a beginner! Solid bag; I did have to refill it twice in the last 6 or 7 weeks. Well, more of a top off than a refill, it did loose its bounce.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: Best speed bag I've ordered to date. Doesn't need filled too often and good consistency for speed and repitition. I will state however, unless you have leather knuckles, you may want to get some light bag gloves. Overall, very durable, and it'll last years.
customer_reviews.author: John Huff

customer_reviews.title: too small
customer_reviews.text: 5x8 too small and i mailed it back for refund they said they never received it ...
customer_reviews.author: barfrausa

customer_reviews.title: different for a 6 "/ 9" bag
customer_reviews.text: For a 6"/9" bag it is unique. The loop is real small making it even smaller than it already is for its size. Only thing is , it dosn't respond as quick as my other bags. It's size makes it different so it'll be an addition to my variety of bags. All bags are a little different, so it just takes a little adjustment and it's just as fun as the rest.
customer_reviews.author: L. Lyng

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. It is a little bit smaller than what I expected, so it may be a bit difficult for beginners. Still, it should more than suffice for your training needs. The air stays in for a good amount of time. I have only had to re pump it once since I purchased it early this year, and that was probably only because of the temperature in the garage where I train. It's much better than the Everlast bag I previously had.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bag
customer_reviews.text: I love the shape and size of this bag (6x9). I am on my second one now. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Redhawk

customer_reviews.title: Works fine, need bigger swivel installed
customer_reviews.text: Does the job, but I had to orderso that it would fit. Something like the "TITLE Pro Swivel"  will not do. Although, it might be because of the swivel and not the bag. In any case it's OK. Lace comes undone sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Duderino

customer_reviews.title: Super fast I love it
customer_reviews.text: As far as begginers I would like something slower. But if money were a object, you could start with it, and try not to get intimadated.
customer_reviews.author: Charles c.

customer_reviews.title: Deflates after a couple of hours
customer_reviews.text: Returning bag because it will not hold air more than a couple of hours. Almost completely deflated by end of day. Have had other bags in the past and usually have to put a little air into them about once a week. Hopefully this one was just defective and the next one will work.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: High quality material
customer_reviews.text: I love this ! Use it mostly every day and still in perfect condition
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get ready to rumble!
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag , super quick, you'll have to get up to speed. Took a seam ripper to the labels to remove them. They will scrap your knuckles. Can't beat the title bags!
customer_reviews.author: Gordon j.

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking/feeling bag...
customer_reviews.text: Good quality bag, a little smaller then I was hoping for but it did give me the size so my own fault. It never came with directions and I'm not sure of the air pressure it should have but I'm making due.. NO complaints...
customer_reviews.author: ryeholt

customer_reviews.title: small bag. works good,
customer_reviews.text: small bag. works good, i have hit speed bag for 20 yrs, this bag is good, buy a small pump use before each workout, bag will lose small amount of air as any will. if you new to hitting get the larger one, this is for expereinced unless you want to jump right to this one. the smaller the bag the faster,
customer_reviews.author: jeff sloan

customer_reviews.title: Bam!
customer_reviews.text: This is really a great bag. I think I went to a smaller bag a little too soon but I love the way it feels and it's tough, I beat the heck out of mine and no issues like I've had with everlast (lower end bags). It's a good choice for a bag on any stand.
customer_reviews.author: C. A. T.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra money
customer_reviews.text: After suffering through a few neverlast bags, I finally bit the bullet and paid a little more for this one. It's worth every extra penny. The balance is great and it actually stays inflated for more than a few days.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Really small
customer_reviews.text: Really small but it works, made the bigger bags way easier to work with
customer_reviews.author: Najee

customer_reviews.title: Finally a speed bag that can survive a beating.
customer_reviews.text: I've bought quite a few speed bags from amazon over the years. Most of them are utter s***e and wear out within weeks. I've been using this one for going on 4 years now and it hasn't blown a seam yet.
customer_reviews.author: Kevan

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and solid speed bag!
customer_reviews.text: Great speed bag, I've had it for three months now and no disappointments so far. Very sturdy and helps with speed and accuracy.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus A. Corella

customer_reviews.title: speed bag
customer_reviews.text: very durable excellent bag takes a beating was using everlast before they kept breaking this bag is great
customer_reviews.author: thomas

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Bladder ruptured within a month. Bag was used correctly and was not subjected to excessive force
customer_reviews.author: Diane H. Boudwin

customer_reviews.title: He was very pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my son-in-law for Christmas. He was very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t even get to hang it up before I realized there was a hole in it sent it back the next morning DO NOT BUY THIS waste of time & money
customer_reviews.author: Chris Shane

customer_reviews.title: Glad Switched Bags
customer_reviews.text: I grew up boxing and always hit everlast. Martial artist sent me to title. Glad he did!
customer_reviews.author: Apple Issues

customer_reviews.title: Really fun &  durable bag!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is my favorite of all my bags. It is smaller than all my others but once one gets used to it, which doesn't take long, it's extremely fun! Will enhance eye hand coordination. Tracks very linear and very durable!
customer_reviews.author: Isaac Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Does not respond quick enough
customer_reviews.text: I bought this smaller bag to help speed up my hands. Not the case. This bag does not rerspond well at all. Too slow! I tried more air, less air. Nothing works. Very unhappy with product.
customer_reviews.author: LOUIS

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Top is made slightly wider than should be and hangs off center on swivel
customer_reviews.author: Ron Raymond

customer_reviews.title: I love the bag
customer_reviews.text: First off! The speed bag arrived a day before the ship date! Secon, the bag is great! Rebounds great, balanced very well! and for the price I plan to buy all the sizes of the speed bag, I love it and will buy more from Title
customer_reviews.author: Nickles

customer_reviews.title: fun little bag
customer_reviews.text: This is the first XS bag I have ever owned, and it is a lot of fun to use. The bag gives me "true" rebounds and it's lite weight is easy on my old elbows. On the negitive side, there is a small seperation on one of the seams, but it isn't getting any worse. IMHO, this is a good bag for the price and I would buy one again. Keep baging.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: best bag I'v had
customer_reviews.text: This bag does not lose air like most bags I'v had. It is a small bag which is good if you like a fast bag like me.
customer_reviews.author: MKN

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: bag filled good have yet to use it because still might return the speed bag set up I got.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: great speed bag
customer_reviews.text: Ive had this speed bag vof about 7 months now it has held up very well ass you know the smaller you go in a bag the faster it switch it out with my medium size bag to get a faster workouit i have had no problems to date with this bag i would recomend it to anyone
customer_reviews.author: David E Gilvin

customer_reviews.title: good bdg
customer_reviews.text: good bag, even better bounce but came with a slow leak. three stars
customer_reviews.author: Rob Young

customer_reviews.title: Get the rythem- Don't give up!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is very challenging, it is small, but with practice and determiination you will be more advanced than using a larger size.------the reason I punch this bag so much is that it is made in China!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for a couple months now and it's holding out pretty good, but check back with me in March or April, I've busted enough of 'em before so we'll see. Keith G.
customer_reviews.author: Keith G. Laufenberg

customer_reviews.title: Pretty small
customer_reviews.text: The bag is pretty small. Not a good bag to begin with. Go with a 12" one if your starting out. You won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag
customer_reviews.text: I've always used Everlast bags but decided to take a chance with this Title Bag. I love... It'a a well balanced, high quality fast bag. When I'm not using my x-small black and yellow Everlast peanut. This Title bag is my bag of choice.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Great looking speed bag. I purchased a couple of these for our gym a few months ago and have no complaints. Great product for your buck.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A good quality. i thought it would be a larger size,
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Great bag.  Much better than Everlast
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I've had it for a couple months now and its still going strong despite the beating that I continually put on it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: No surprises
customer_reviews.text: Well made, good value for the money, love the slight oversize, helps to improve head movement since I have to move a bit more sideways.
customer_reviews.author: David Silva

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag
customer_reviews.text: The speed bag arrived very quickly. It was easy to set up. Great value for the price. I highly recomend it.
customer_reviews.author: cattali

customer_reviews.title: GREAT speedbag! Period!
customer_reviews.text: Have had this bag for a while now and has held up PERFECTLY! May have 'freshened' up the air once or twice...maybe. The bag holds air great, rebounds really well and has been an outstanding bag since I first hit it. However, make sure you have some decent rhythm before you get a 5x8 bag as they are smaller and a bit more difficult.
customer_reviews.author: MCMANNES

customer_reviews.title: Leather Is Where It's At
customer_reviews.text: This leather Title Classic Speed Bag 6"x 9" is the real deal. You got to really have strong and tuff hands to love it. If you don't, this bag will definitely make them that way along with increasing your hand speed. I ordered this one and the small one. I would highly recommend these bags for the serious trainer/boxer.
customer_reviews.author: People R Saying

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This is a sweet speed bag. Title equipment is made to last and perform. tough....fast....worth every cent! Hand speed and rhythm builder for sure!!
customer_reviews.author: David W

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good for the price. I got the 5×8 the lace is black not white.
customer_reviews.author: Gustavo monares

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This is the first bag that I've bought that has lasted more than two sessions, could be little faster but I love the price and the durability, and I will buy one again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Chose this bag for value as a beginner. I have been very satisfied with it, used daily until my swivel broke.
customer_reviews.author: crosstrain1

customer_reviews.title: awesome service
customer_reviews.text: The speed bag is awesome, but even better was the service. I am a soldier in Afghanistan and ordered the speed bag as a tool to relieve stress in my down time. So, a speed bag was shipped and it did not retain air, I called Title and emailed amazon working together they replaced the bag quickly. I am extremely content with the speed bag, but even better the service. I will certainly order Title equipment and order from amazon again. Title is a professional leader in providing combative sports equipment and I am impressed with the selection. They have quality products priced to gives the consumer that has more or less money options.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Works Good
customer_reviews.text: I just thought it would of been a little bigger, The small it is the harder the bag is to hit it. But works great and getting the hand of it.
customer_reviews.author: Armando Roman

customer_reviews.title: Fun bags!
customer_reviews.text: The speed bag is great. Reacts great to hits and bounce back is precise. Product had no defects. And was delivered promptly without difficulties.
customer_reviews.author: Kuljeet Chouhan

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product and much better than the TKOs cheap bags that rip. I would recommend this to anyone needing to train!
customer_reviews.author: johnny armes

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected. Got what I needed and the excelent quality that comes with evrey thing title makes. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: peter

customer_reviews.title: Knock Out
customer_reviews.text: Received product fast..loved it from the box to the platform.. U really need to know how to hit the speedbag at this size..xsmall. Only issue for me is that the title tag cuts at Ur wraps or bag gloves. Other than that it is made very well. Would recommend to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Handsome Jack

customer_reviews.title: great bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag has held up to a lot of abuse. My friends and I have really put it through the ringer. We have had similar products that don't compare to this one. I would buy this one again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: steven adams

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: the bag hangs lopsided because the panels were cut uneven before they were sawn together . I called "Title" and asked if they had any quality control and they said "No" , they said I could sent bag back,(at my cost) for a review of bag.I won't be putting anymore money into this bag ....BEWARE
customer_reviews.author: steven charles faria

customer_reviews.title: not what was posted.
customer_reviews.text: This does not swivel &have a good comeback recoil whn hit. I contacted them due to me not selecting which one I wanted size wise. The description gave impression this was 2size bags you were getting. I wouldn't hve paid 25 for one super small bag. Just my opinion. Not happy. Husband ordered another one from another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Christie

customer_reviews.title: title classic speed bag
customer_reviews.text: it is too small like for a child and I still have the mdse.........my husband thought it was a large size.
customer_reviews.author: Mary E Valdivia

customer_reviews.title: Great Product. Small
customer_reviews.text: Returned. Too small. Pic makes it look bigger but I should have read more closely. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: R. A. Hedrick

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag only reason I returned because it was too small, but this brand is very good .
customer_reviews.author: Erica Torres

product_meta.title: Title Classic Speed Bag
product_meta.description: Tough, super fast and lightweight leather build. All-leather welted seams, triple stitched and precision balanced for true rebounds. Loop is extra-reinforced for long wear. Complete with extended-life rubber bladder.
feature_bullets: Tough, super fast and lightweight leather build
All-leather welted seams, triple stitched and precision balanced

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
